Typealiases.html#/s:17BSAlertController1.name: AlertActionHandler
Typealiases.html#/s:17BSAlertController1.abstract: The closure type of alert action handler.

Structs/BSAlert/BSAlertType.html#/s:17BS.name: confirm
Structs/BSAlert/BSAlertType.html#/s:17BS.abstract: Alert view will contains only one confirm button.

Structs/BSAlert/BSAlertType.html#/s:17BS.name: optional
Structs/BSAlert/BSAlertType.html#/s:17BS.abstract: Alert view will contains confirm and cancel buttons.

Structs/BSAlert/BSAlertTitleType.html.name: BSAlertTitleType
Structs/BSAlert/BSAlertTitleType.html.abstract: Determine the title of the alert view

Classes/BSAlertController.html#/s:17BSAl.name: shared
Classes/BSAlertController.html#/s:17BSAl.abstract: The BSAlertController singleton. The main pointof entry to this BSAlertController library.

Classes/BSAlertController.html#/s:17BSAl.name: displayQueue
Classes/BSAlertController.html#/s:17BSAl.abstract: A list contains alert objects which are prepare to display.

Classes/BSAlertController.html#/s:17BSAl.name: show(_:)
Classes/BSAlertController.html#/s:17BSAl.abstract: Display an alert with full custom BSAlert.

Classes/BSAlertController.html#/s:17BSAl.name: show(message:confirm:)
Classes/BSAlertController.html#/s:17BSAl.abstract: Display an CONFIRM type alert with default settings except message and confirm action handler.

Classes/BSAlertController.html#/s:17BSAl.name: showOptional(message:confirm:cancel:)
Classes/BSAlertController.html#/s:17BSAl.abstract: Display an OPTIONAL type alert with default settings except message and action handlers.

Classes/BSAlertController.html#/s:17BSAl.name: show(message:)
Classes/BSAlertController.html#/s:17BSAl.abstract: Display an CONFIRM type alert with default settings except message.

Classes/BSAlertController.html#/s:17BSAl.name: showError(message:)
Classes/BSAlertController.html#/s:17BSAl.abstract: Display an CONFIRM type alert with error style title and customized message.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
